tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE KitchenTools (
    tool_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    tool_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    tool_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    stored_location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE KitchenEquipment (
    equipment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    equipment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    depreciation_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE InventoryTransactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    tool_id UUID REFERENCES KitchenTools(tool_id),
    equipment_id UUID REFERENCES KitchenEquipment(equipment_id),
    quantity_change INT NOT NULL,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE kitchen_tools (
   tool_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   tool_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   tool_category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   quantity INT NOT NULL,
   price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE kitchen_equipments (
   equipment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   equipment_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   equipment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   quantity INT NOT NULL,
   price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE tool_transactions (
   transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   tool_id UUID NOT NULL,
   transaction_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
   transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
   quantity_change INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE equipment_transactions (
   transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   equipment_id UUID NOT NULL,
   transaction_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
   transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
   quantity_change INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE tool_logs (
   log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   tool_id UUID NOT NULL,
   log_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
   log_description TEXT
);
